titleStmt.title: General Assembly of the State of Vermont

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: General Assembly of the State of Vermont

body.p: Office of the Secretary of State of Vermont. Handles elections, state archives, professional regulations, corporations, domestic issues, notaries, municipalities, and administrative rules. Civil War-era Secretary of States: Benjamin W. Dean (1857-1861); George W. Bailey Jr. (1861-1865); George Nichols (1865-1884).

ab.bibl: Vermont: Secretary of State, “About the Office,” https://www.sec.state.vt.us/ (accessed May 14, 2019).
